content.headline: Auto & Transport Roundup: Market Talk
content.summary: 0630 GMT –  Nio  sales volume growth is likely to stay strong into 2024 and 2025 after picking up momentum in October,  HSBC  analysts say in a note.  HSBC keeps a buy call on Nio but cuts its ADRs target to $10.70 from $18.00, and H-shares to HK$83.80 from HK$142.00 to factor in tougher competition in the EV market.  Its 3Q revenue and core operating profit were supported by improving rail ridership in Singapore and by U.K. bus contract renewals and cost indexation which have begun to come through, the analysts note.
